PROMOTE_TO_MANAGER.HEADING: Promote to Manager
PROMOTE_TO_MANAGER.DESCRIPTION: This option allows you to promote your sales agent as a store manager on StoreFront. This gives them access to almost all the features available in the StoreFront store in which they were created.

CONCEAL_CUSTOMER_INFO.HEADING: Conceal Customer Info
CONCEAL_CUSTOMER_INFO.DESCRIPTION: This feature enables the Shop Admin to hide customer contact information from a sales agent.

PROMOTE_TO_GIVE_DISCOUNT.HEADING: Promote To Give Discount
PROMOTE_TO_GIVE_DISCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This option enables the Shop Admin to promote a sales agent to give discounts on a sales transaction.

PROMOTE_TO_MODIFY_SALES.HEADING: Promote To Modify Sales
PROMOTE_TO_MODIFY_SALES.DESCRIPTION: This option allows sales agents to change a processed sales order. In the instance where a customer returns a previously purchased item, the shop agent can correct the sales order to reflect the change.

VIEW_PROFIT_INFO.HEADING: View Profit Information
VIEW_PROFIT_INFO.DESCRIPTION: This option allows sales agents to see margin/profit information on sales orders.

BACKDATE_SALES_ORDERS.HEADING: Backdate Sales Order
BACKDATE_SALES_ORDERS.DESCRIPTION: This option gives sales agents permission to backdate sales orders.

CURRENCY.HEADING: CURRENCY
CURRENCY.DESCRIPTION: Select the currency (Naira, Cedi) that you accept.

SAGEONE_ACCOUNTING.HEADING: SAGEONE ACCOUNTING
SAGEONE_ACCOUNTING.DESCRIPTION: Connect your current shop to SageOne to ensure all your transactions are posted and synced on your account.

RETURN_POLICY.HEADING: RETURN POLICY
RETURN_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Indicate the number of days in which items sold can be returned to the shop.

WHATSAPP_COMMUNICATIONS.HEADING: WHATSAPP COMMUNICATIONS
WHATSAPP_COMMUNICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Activate the WhatsApp communications option to receive all information from Storefront directly on to your  WhatsApp line.

PARTNER_CONNECT.HEADING: PARTNER CONNECT
PARTNER_CONNECT.DESCRIPTION: You can connect a partner to your shop.

DATA_BACKUP.HEADING: DATA BACKUP
DATA_BACKUP.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the last time data was backed up between your device and Storefront.

ALLOW_GLOBAL_DELIVERY.HEADING: ALLOW GLOBAL DELIVERY
ALLOW_GLOBAL_DELIVERY.DESCRIPTION: Allow your online store's product listing when a customer visits your store outside of your country.

EMAIL_REPORTING.HEADING: EMAIL REPORTING
EMAIL_REPORTING.DESCRIPTION: Allow or Disallow your store's reporting emails, Reports can be Daily, Weekly, Monthly or Yearly.

VERIFY_EMAIL.HEADING: VERIFY EMAIL
VERIFY_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Verify your email (Skip this if you have already verified your email).
